description: The file 'main.dart' serves as the entry point for a Flutter application called Event Manager. It initializes the Flutter widget binding, sets up multiple provider-based state management objects, and launches the root widget of the app. It also contains placeholders for future Firebase initialization.

classes.name: EventManagerApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that provides a top-level MultiProvider with various ChangeNotifierProviders for managing app state, and builds the root widget of the Event Manager application.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function that initializes Flutter bindings, prepares for Firebase (future work), and runs the EventManagerApp widget.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree by providing multiple state management providers and returning the root widget of the app.
